mapper.select: select * from ms_staff a inner join class_history b on a.id = b.home_room_teacher_id where 1 = 1 order by a.pk_class_history asc
select count(*) from ms_staff a where 1 = 1
mapper.insert: insert into ms_staff ( staff_code, staff_name, staff_dob, staff_sex, staff_marital_status, staff_address, staff_phone_no, staff_entrance_date, staff_type, staff_status ) values ( #{code}, #{name}, #{dob}, #{sex}, #{maritalStatus}, #{address}, #{phoneNo}, #{joinDate}, #{type}, #{status} )
mapper.update: update ms_staff set staff_code = #{code}, staff_name = #{name}, staff_dob = #{dob}, staff_sex = #{sex}, staff_marital_status = #{maritalStatus}, staff_address = #{address}, staff_phone_no = #{phoneNo}, staff_entrance_date = #{joinDate}, staff_type = #{type}, staff_status = #{status} where id = #{pkStaff}
